description: The Motorola Razr flip phone is back, but now its an Android smartphone with a foldable display. The 2019 Razr keeps the same general form factor, but replaces the T-9 keypad and small LCD with a 6.2-inch, foldable plastic OLED panel and Android 9 Pie. Itll cost $1,499 when it arrives in January of next year.
